title: Sans serif ID please <id: skia></id:>
content:
I feel like I should know this, but I can't put my finger on it. The 'R' is the key to it. Any help please?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015011241im_/http:/typophile.com/files/swap_5557.png)
author: jonsel

comments.content: It looks like Lithos but it is [Skia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015011241/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/carter_cone/skia_cc_regular/?sample_text=SWAPDRIVE).
Yeah, I knew it wasn't lithos. Skia it is. Thanks!
